code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./BlockMovies.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlockMovies=_ref=>{let{movies,onOpenMoviePage,onOpenTrailer,onRemove,isFavoritesList}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const numberSvgPaths=['icons/one.svg','icons/two.svg','icons/three.svg','icons/four.svg','icons/five.svg','icons/six.svg','icons/seven.svg','icons/eight.svg','icons/nine.svg','icons/ten.svg'];const handleMovieClick=id=>{navigate("/movie/".concat(id));};const handleRemoveClick=(e,movieId)=>{e.stopPropagation();onRemove===null||onRemove===void 0?void 0:onRemove(String(movieId));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[!isFavoritesList&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"block-movies__title",children:"\u0422\u043E\u043F 10 \u0444\u0438\u043B\u044C\u043C\u043E\u0432"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"block-movies__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"block-movies__list",children:(isFavoritesList?movies:movies.slice(0,10)).map((movie,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"block-movies__item",style:{cursor:'pointer'},onClick:()=>handleMovieClick(movie.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"block-movies__image",src:movie.posterUrl,width:"224",height:"336",alt:"\u041F\u043E\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0440 \u0444\u0438\u043B\u044C\u043C\u0430 ".concat(movie.title)}),!isFavoritesList&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"block-movies__number-image",src:numberSvgPaths[index<numberSvgPaths.length?index:0],width:"14",height:"32","aria-hidden":"true",alt:"".concat(index+1)}),isFavoritesList&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"remove-button",onClick:e=>handleRemoveClick(e,String(movie.id)),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/icons/icon-back-modal.svg",alt:"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C"})})]},movie.id))})})]});};export default BlockMovies;
